name: Cross-Eyed Monkeys
description:
In an ancient prehistoric island, there lived a tribe of monkeys and a tribe of lemurs. The lemurs had stolen the greatest "treasure" from the monkey tribe. Enraged, the chief sent their "best" monkeys to recover the "treasures". Cross-Eyed Monkeys is new breed of nonlinear Free-style Running Platformer with multi-route course and transformable terrains. Complete each stages your way by performing unique monkey skills like no other running games. Fight epic lemur bosses in exciting multi-phrased active timed battle. Challenge friends to beat their best scores. Dress up your monkeys for fashion and enhancement. And Much More! Run Cross-Eyed Squad!! Go kick some cute lemur butts~~ Features:

- Switch character & use skills with 1 tap.

- Absolute replayability with Multi-route course design. Players can decide which route to take based on their preferences.

- Exciting Boss fights with multi-phrased Active Timed Battle system. Perform specific actions in specific time to defeat bosses.

- Pack your backpack before with powerful items before runs to make it much easier.

- Endless Mode, Classic Mode, Challenge Mode. Defeat other players for glory and the rarest items and costumes.

- World Ranking Competitions with rich rewards.
